content: **note ** this pattern is available for free on my blog aurora bulky knit hat pattern is one more project for an absolute beginners the pattern is available for free please enjoy it **video tutorial** https //www youtube com/watch v=xei3ghpv4q8&t=28s **matching mittens pattern ** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bulky-mittens-family-set you are welcome to follow my **youtube** channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram ** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/ **fur pom poms** shop http //crazyhands net/shop/
